vendor_name: Royal Livingstone Victoria Falls Zambia Hotel by Anantara
title: Five-Star Africa Safari Lodge with Private Butler Service & Victoria Falls Access
description: Tick off a bucket-list adventure in five-star style with an escape to The Royal Livingstone Victoria Falls Zambia Hotel by Anantara. This lavish haven - positioned directly upriver from the Victoria Falls UNESCO World Heritage Site - is steeped in African custom, with European influence felt in the deep verandas, generous living spaces and cool courtyards. Boasting indescribable grace, the pi√®ce de resistance is most certainly the breathtaking front-row seat to the African bush.
location_description: The Royal Livingstone Victoria Falls Zambia Hotel by Anantara

title: Zambia Safari-Style Oasis Steps from Victoria Falls with Outdoor Pool
description: Tick off a bucket list adventure with a stay at the spellbinding Avani Victoria Falls Resort. Watch wildlife and luxury come together at this wild and wonderful haven - mere steps from Victoria Falls UNESCO World Heritage Site. Immerse yourself in African customs at the onsite restaurants and plunge into the glittering pool before retreating to your magical hideaway where you can marvel at zebras and giraffes ambling by.
